official_title: A joint resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the Special Supplemental Food Program for Women, Infants, and Children should receive increasing amounts of appropriations in fiscal year 1988 and succeeding fiscal years.
subjects: Federal aid to child health services

summary.text: WIC Food for Life Resolution - Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) the Special Supplemental Food Program for Women, Infants, and Children (WIC) should receive increasing appropriations until all eligible persons are being served; and (2) an outreach program should be conducted to identify persons eligible for WIC assistance.

titles.title: A joint resolution to express the sense of the Congress that the Special Supplemental Food Program for Women, Infants, and Children should receive increasing amounts of appropriations in fiscal year 1988 and succeeding fiscal years.
